as.leap

Class LCGoogleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • as.leap.LCGoogleUtils

  • public final class LCGoogleUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a set of utilities for using LC with Google.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GooglePlatform getPlatform()
      Gets the shared Google singleton that LC is using.
      static GoogleProvider getProvider() 
      static void initialize(java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Initializes Google for use with LC.
      static boolean isLinked(LCUser user)
      Returns true if the user is linked to a Google account.
      static void linkInBackground(LCUser user, android.app.Activity activity, SaveCallback saveCallback)
      Links a existing LCUser to a Google account, allowing you to use Google for authentication, and providing access to Google data for the user.
      static void logInInBackground(android.app.Activity activity, LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)
      Logs in a LCUser using Instagram for authentication.
      static void unlinkInBackground(LCUser user, SaveCallback saveCallback)
      Unlinks a user from a Google account in the background.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getPlatform

        public static GooglePlatform getPlatform()
        Gets the shared Google singleton that LC is using.
        Returns:
        the Instagram

      • getProvider

        public static GoogleProvider getProvider()

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String clientId,
                              java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Initializes Google for use with LC.
        Parameters:
        clientId - Your Google client id.
        clientSecret - Your Google client secret.

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(android.app.Activity activity,
                                     LogInCallback<LCUser> callback)
        Logs in a LCUser using Instagram for authentication. If a user for the given Google credentials does not already exist, a new user will be created. A dialog will be shown to the user for Google authentication.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity which is starting the login process.
        callback - Callback for notifying the calling application when the Google authentication has completed, failed, or been canceled.

      • isLinked

        public static boolean isLinked(LCUser user)
        Returns true if the user is linked to a Google account.
        Parameters:
        user - User to check for Google.
        Returns:
        True if the user has Google credentials. False if the user has't got Google credentials.

      • linkInBackground

        public static void linkInBackground(LCUser user,
                                    android.app.Activity activity,
                                    SaveCallback saveCallback)
        Links a existing LCUser to a Google account, allowing you to use Google for authentication, and providing access to Google data for the user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to linkInBackground to a Google account.
        activity - The activity which is starting the login process.
        saveCallback - Callback for notifying the calling application when the Google authentication has completed, failed, or been canceled.

      • unlinkInBackground

        public static void unlinkInBackground(LCUser user,
                                      SaveCallback saveCallback)
        Unlinks a user from a Google account in the background. Unlinking a user will save the user's data.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to linkInBackground to a Google account.
        saveCallback - Callback for notifying the calling application .
